title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Short-Intensive Training Using Physiology Simulations and PACS Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze physiological responses of major human body systems (respiratory, circulatory, etc.) with 80% accuracy using simulation tools.
Learners can explain the basic components and image management processes of a PACS system step-by-step and share this knowledge with peers.
In a simulated environment, learners can identify PACS workflow error cases and propose three or more response strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
